1370: Philips moved to Lange gracht.B.5 after marriage.
Got married to Volcwiif at age 31 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Alene, at age 31.
1373: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Gloria, at age 34.
1377: Had a son with Volcwiif, Ludingus, at age 38.
1378: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Reynildis, at age 39.
1379: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Ghodelde, at age 40.
1380: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Wendelmodis, at age 41.
1383: Lost daughter Segherarden when Segherarden was 0 years old.
Volcwiif gave birth to their stillborn daughter Segherarden in 1383.
